Although challenges to their faith are often brought up - usually from questioning by the two sons. They make it clear that keeping faith takes work. 

I am not Catholic -- but I still very much appreciate their efforts. (Although I admit their attempts to depict other religions positively - is a hard go for them!)

I'm looking forward to what script changes may be made - with the appointment of Bratton, our new police commissioner.

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 1595859, Title: Blue Bloods, --- Description: Blue Bloods: Created by Mitchell Burgess, Robin Green. With Donnie Wahlberg, Bridget Moynahan, Will Estes, Len Cariou. Revolves around a family of New York cops." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1595859/","name":"Blue Bloods","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY0NTE1ODU3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTI4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Revolves around a family of New York cops.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1595859/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"thelmalee","dateCreated":"2013-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoy the family dinners, and the religion (I'm not Catholic)","reviewBody":"My sister and I watch and discuss this series every Friday. We absolutely love the family dinners. So incredibly nice to see a family that all love and respect each other. Although challenges to their faith are often brought up - usually from questioning by the two sons. They make it clear that keeping faith takes work. 

I am not Catholic -- but I still very much appreciate their efforts. (Although I admit their attempts to depict other religions positively - is a hard go for them!)

I'm looking forward to what script changes may be made - with the appointment of Bratton, our new police commissioner. 

(St. Vincent's Hospital is still open in this drama - ah, if only it were so.)","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34487,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2010-09-24","keywords":"new york police department,family relationships,brother brother relationship,father daughter relationship,family of cops","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005531/","name":"Donnie Wahlberg","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005256/","name":"Bridget Moynahan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0261678/","name":"Will Estes"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0106949/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0315236/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0121331/","name":"Mitchell Burgess","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1053841/","name":"Robin Green"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Blue Bloods: Series","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4119967769","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"First Look Trailer for Blue Bloods"</script><metacontent="

Although challenges to their faith are often brought up - usually from questioning by the two sons. They make it clear that keeping faith takes work. 

I am not Catholic -- but I still very much appreciate their efforts. (Although I admit their attempts to depict other religions positively - is a hard go for them!)

Blue Bloods: Created by Mitchell Burgess, Robin Green. With Donnie Wahlberg, Bridget Moynahan, Will Estes, Len Cariou. Revolves around a family of New York cops." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1595859/","name":"Blue Bloods","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY0NTE1ODU3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTI4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Revolves around a family of New York cops.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1595859/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"thelmalee"},"dateCreated":"2013-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoy the family dinners, and the religion (I'm not Catholic)","reviewBody":"My sister and I watch and discuss this series every Friday. We absolutely love the family dinners. So incredibly nice to see a family that all love and respect each other. Although challenges to their faith are often brought up - usually from questioning by the two sons. They make it clear that keeping faith takes work. 

I am not Catholic -- but I still very much appreciate their efforts. (Although I admit their attempts to depict other religions positively - is a hard go for them!)

I'm looking forward to what script changes may be made - with the appointment of Bratton, our new police commissioner. 

(St. Vincent's Hospital is still open in this drama - ah, if only it were so.)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34487,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2010-09-24","keywords":"new york police department,family relationships,brother brother relationship,father daughter relationship,family of cops","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005531/","name":"Donnie Wahlberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005256/","name":"Bridget Moynahan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0261678/","name":"Will Estes"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0106949/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0315236/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0121331/","name":"Mitchell Burgess"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1053841/","name":"Robin Green"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Blue Bloods: Series","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4119967769","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"First Look Trailer for Blue Bloods"}}</script><metacontent="

Revolves around a family of New York cops." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1595859/","name":"Blue Bloods","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY0NTE1ODU3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTI4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Revolves around a family of New York cops.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1595859/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"thelmalee","dateCreated":"2013-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoy the family dinners, and the religion (I'm not Catholic)","reviewBody":"My sister and I watch and discuss this series every Friday. We absolutely love the family dinners. So incredibly nice to see a family that all love and respect each other. Although challenges to their faith are often brought up - usually from questioning by the two sons. They make it clear that keeping faith takes work. 

I am not Catholic -- but I still very much appreciate their efforts. (Although I admit their attempts to depict other religions positively - is a hard go for them!)

I'm looking forward to what script changes may be made - with the appointment of Bratton, our new police commissioner.

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 1595859, Title: Blue Bloods, --- Description: Blue Bloods: Created by Mitchell Burgess, Robin Green. With Donnie Wahlberg, Bridget Moynahan, Will Estes, Len Cariou. Revolves around a family of New York cops." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1595859/","name":"Blue Bloods","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY0NTE1ODU3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTI4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Revolves around a family of New York cops.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1595859/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"thelmalee","dateCreated":"2013-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoy the family dinners, and the religion (I'm not Catholic)","reviewBody":"My sister and I watch and discuss this series every Friday. We absolutely love the family dinners. So incredibly nice to see a family that all love and respect each other. Although challenges to their faith are often brought up - usually from questioning by the two sons. They make it clear that keeping faith takes work. 

I am not Catholic -- but I still very much appreciate their efforts. (Although I admit their attempts to depict other religions positively - is a hard go for them!)

(St. Vincent's Hospital is still open in this drama - ah, if only it were so.)","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34487,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2010-09-24","keywords":"new york police department,family relationships,brother brother relationship,father daughter relationship,family of cops","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005531/","name":"Donnie Wahlberg","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005256/","name":"Bridget Moynahan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0261678/","name":"Will Estes"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0106949/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0315236/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0121331/","name":"Mitchell Burgess","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1053841/","name":"Robin Green"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Blue Bloods: Series","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4119967769","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"First Look Trailer for Blue Bloods"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Maja
programme.desc: Cykl prezentujący wyselekcjonowany zbiór najlepszych filmów krótkometrażowych. Wiele z nich nagrodzonych zostało prestiżowymi wyróżnieniami na międzynarodowych galach i festiwalach filmowych. Każde pasmo przedstawia kilka produkcji na dany temat.

programme.title: Ukojenie
Super Comfort
programme.desc: 52-letnia Taina (Tiina Pirhonen) przygotowuje się na idealny weekend z rodziną, ponieważ jej syn Eetu (Paavo Kinnunen) odwiedza ją ze swoją dziewczyną. Spotkanie nie przebiega jednak zgodnie z planem. Im bardziej samotna kobieta próbuje rozbawić bliskich, tym mniej komfortowo się oni czują.

programme.title: Troche w ciazy

programme.desc: Troche w ciazy: Directed by Piotr Matwiejczyk. With Sylwia Boron, Robert Buczynski, Piotr Matwiejczyk, Andrzej Galla. The story of the relationship between the energetic and resourceful Gosia and the lazy and slightly reckless Wojtek, whose relationship is put to the test. They are going through a deep crisis. It may turn out that the help of Wojtek's colleague, resolute but childish Tadek, will change the fate of these two." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt13758506/","name":"Troche w ciazy","description":"The story of the relationship between the energetic and resourceful Gosia and the lazy and slightly reckless Wojtek, whose relationship is put to the test. programme.title: Faites sauter la banque
Napad na bank
Faites sauter la banque!
programme.desc: Faites sauter la banque!: Directed by Jean Girault. With Louis de Funès, Yvonne Clech, Jean-Pierre Marielle, Anne Doat. A grouchy shopkeeper made an unsuccessful financial investment, and now he is on the verge of bankruptcy. In order to avenge oneself he engages his own family into a plan to rob a next door bank." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0057051/","name":"Faites sauter la banque!","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjE1NDM2YzUtMjY1OC00NTdkLTg3MWYtOTk2Y2RiMWQ3N2Q5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTgxOTIzNzk@._V1_.jpg","description":"A grouchy shopkeeper made an unsuccessful financial investment, and now he is on the verge of bankruptcy. In order to avenge oneself he engages his own family into a plan to rob a next door bank.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0057051/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"languedoc-586-836028"},"dateCreated":"2018-11-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Brilliant (changed my rating from 8 to 9 upon second viewing)!","reviewBody":"This is a surrealistic comedy, and it doesn't matter that its plot and situational developments are far-fetched. The director here is Jean Girault, who did some of the best De Funès films (and in particular some of the best from the Gendarme series). Fast-paced, brilliantly acted, hilarious... The banker from the start is guilty of insider trading BTW (which the Storyline here does not mention). This is necessary to make us sympathize at least basically with De Funès in his criminal undertaking to right wrong-doing, with the unlikely complicity of his incredible family. All terrific actors BTW.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2071,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"1964-02-25","keywords":"tunneling,spoof,bank heist,stock fraud,tough girl","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000086/","name":"Louis de Funès"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0165915/","name":"Yvonne Clech"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0547339/","name":"Jean-Pierre Marielle"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0320833/","name":"Jean Girault"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0032877/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010669/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0897505/","name":"Jacques Vilfrid"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0320833/","name":"Jean Girault"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0764583/","name":"Louis Sapin"}],"duration":"PT1H28M"}</script><metacontent="

In order to avenge oneself he engages his own family into a plan to rob a next door bank.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0057051/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"languedoc-586-836028","dateCreated":"2018-11-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Brilliant (changed my rating from 8 to 9 upon second viewing)!","reviewBody":"This is a surrealistic comedy, and it doesn't matter that its plot and situational developments are far-fetched. The director here is Jean Girault, who did some of the best De Funès films (and in particular some of the best from the Gendarme series). Fast-paced, brilliantly acted, hilarious... The banker from the start is guilty of insider trading BTW (which the Storyline here does not mention). This is necessary to make us sympathize at least basically with De Funès in his criminal undertaking to right wrong-doing, with the unlikely complicity of his incredible family. programme.title: The Iron Lady
Żelazna Dama
The Iron Lady
programme.desc:
The Iron Lady: Directed by Phyllida Lloyd. With Meryl Streep, Jim Broadbent, Susan Brown, Alice da Cunha. An elderly Margaret Thatcher talks to the imagined presence of her recently deceased husband as she struggles to come to terms with his death while scenes from her past life, from girlhood to British prime minister, intervene." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1007029/","name":"The Iron Lady","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODEzNDUyMDE3NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTgzOTg3Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An elderly Margaret Thatcher talks to the imagined presence of her recently deceased husband as she struggles to come to terms with his death while scenes from her past life, from girlhood to British prime minister, intervene.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1007029/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Loving_Silence"},"dateCreated":"2011-11-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Meryl Streep gives a spectacular performance in a flawed, but great biopic","reviewBody":"Before viewing, "The Iron Lady", I didn't really know much about Margaret Thatcher. Other than she was the prime minister of England for 11 years, she was a very controversial figure and still is to this day. So I was really interested to see the film and I decided to visit the WGA screening.

Now let me begin by saying, Meryl Streep embodies Margaret Thatcher. She doesn't just look like her, but she talks like her, her facial expressions are spot on. Meryl Streep becomes Margaret Thatcher. I would be shocked if she doesn't win an Oscar for this performance. The supporting cast is good too, Jim Broadbent gives an excellent performance, everyone is just great.

However aside from the top notch acting, the movie had a few flaws. The story was uninteresting at times, the flashback scenes were a bit muddled and a little confusing. The movie felt a little too safe, it tried too hard, not to be controversial. Although I don't entirely blame the film itself for that. Margaret Thatcher was such a decisive person, that whichever side the film picked, it would be criticized by a lot of people. I guess the film ultimately achieved the goal.

I also liked the movie didn't dwell too much on the politics, but on the character of Margaret Thatcher. We see the human side of The Iron Lady herself, beyond all the partisan politics and rumors, we get to see a very personal and sad side of her. The subplot focusing on Thacther's grief over her husband's death, as the older version battles with hallucinations and an unwillingness to let go of her dear Denis are heartbreaking.

Overall the movie was really well done, but just shy of greatness. Meryl Streep's performance and the supporting cast, truly elevates the film into a great biopic. Although I wished a little more time was spent on focusing on her political life, the movie successfully showed a deep and moving side of the prime minister. Which a lot of biopics fail to do. Whatever your opinions might be on Margaret Thatcher, don't fault the movie because of the opinion. And I highly respect Phyllida LLoyd, Meryl Streep, Abi Morgan and others for trying to portray such a decisive and highly controversial figure.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":106150,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Drama"],"datePublished":"2012-01-06","keywords":"10 downing street london,old woman,old age,british conservative party,british female politician","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1047305753","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAxMDYwNzc1M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTg3OTcyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAxMDYwNzc1M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTg3OTcyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A look at the life of Margaret Thatcher, the former Prime Minister of the United Kingdom, with a focus on the price she paid for power."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000658/","name":"Meryl Streep"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000980/","name":"Jim Broadbent"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001290/","name":"Richard E. Grant"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1630273/","name":"Phyllida Lloyd"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0242217/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022869/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0197272/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0604448/","name":"Abi Morgan"}],"duration":"PT1H45M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Vanishing
Zaginiona bez śladu
The Vanishing
programme.desc:
The Vanishing: Directed by George Sluizer. With Jeff Bridges, Kiefer Sutherland, Nancy Travis, Sandra Bullock. The boyfriend of an abducted woman never gives up the search as the abductor looks on." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0108473/","name":"The Vanishing","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmUwMmU2YzgtYTU3OC00YzlmLWJlYTgtM2NmMzYzNGU2ODZiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The boyfriend of an abducted woman never gives up the search as the abductor looks on.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0108473/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"JasonDanielBaker"},"dateCreated":"2014-08-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Bungled Hollywood Movie Killed By Audience & Critic Perceptions","reviewBody":"In this remake of the 1988 Dutch film 'Spoorloos' writer Jeff Harriman (Kiefer Sutherland) searches for his girlfriend Diane (Sandra Bullock) who disappeared from a gas station during a road trip they took 3 years earlier.

His new girlfriend (Nancy Travis) tries to help him pick up the pieces of his life but gets increasingly frustrated over his fascination with the mystery. Diane's kidnapper Barney (Jeff Bridges) has his own interest piqued by Jeff.

There still persists the perception that remakes are inferior to originals and that European cinema is artistically superior to Hollywood. This movie is used to illustrate those points. But these are far from the only reasons it flopped.

The casting didn't follow the traditional route. It does not impact the quality of the production and should not be counted as negative. But it deflated the commercial appeal by ignoring the superficial tastes of moviegoers.

Kiefer Sutherland is an actor audiences more readily accept as a darker character than victimized nice guy Jeff. This is well-evidenced by his critical triumph in the movie 'Freeway' three years later as a kidnapper/murderer. 

At the time he was also mostly seen bolstering ensemble casts rather than as a conventional male lead. His strong performance should have been enough to carry the film and it would have been had there not been other factors.

Jeff Bridges was more readily accepted by audiences as a nice guy male lead. He wanted to play a creep for a change and did an impeccable job here. But audiences had to look past over 20 years of typecasting to accept him in the role and most couldn't. As a result one of the finest characterizations in his long, distinguished career is overlooked.

No actress could have given a more convincing performance than Nancy Travis in the role of Rita, the heroine. But audiences liked Sandra Bullock better and have always wanted to see more of her which in this case would have meant giving her the more substantial role of Rita than the tragic role of kidnapped Diane.

At the time (1991-92 pre-production) how could anyone know that Sandra Bullock would soon top the box office like few actresses before her? Nancy Travis had been in a string of hits but then little-known Bullock would surpass her as a star within 18 months of the release of this film. Had they known, there can be little doubt Bullock would have played Rita.

The ultimate sin that North American film audiences could not forgive is obvious pandering to their own glaring superficial tastes when it comes to how movies end. The 1988 original European version haunted audiences and made them think because of its dark conclusion. That version didn't have a Hollywood ending and that was its payoff - one meant for an entirely different audience.

The Hollywood version not only wraps up the conflict between the characters differently (rewarding perseverance over intellect, good over evil in typical Hollywood tradition), it also includes a tacked-on, whimsical denouement. North American film audiences DO prefer happy endings with neat and tidy closure.

But expecting them to embrace the glaring implication that they can't handle scary and/or thought-provoking material is an unforgivable insult which could only elicit the kind of derision from reviewers that it has even though the action which leads up to it is far from boring or silly. Had the film been an original with a facile and obtuse resolution it would have been accepted if not embraced.

Hollywood studios obviously have final approval on the cut released to theatres in most instances. A trick some auteurs can employ when attempting to keep the integrity of a darker-themed film is to wait until the deadline before delivering the finished product and including two endings. One ending will be the darker one they want. The other will be the happy ending - one shot and cut so badly that the studio will presumably have to go with the darker ending. This ploy might work if studios cared more about the quality of what they were releasing rather than its box office p potential.

Then there is the release date - February, 1993. What happens in February in Western Culture every year? Valentine's Day! Does this look like a date movie to you? Everything about how this movie was made and marketed invited flop status.

As I said the action which leads up to the finale is far from boring or silly. In fact much of it is quite watchable and on par with (and in many cases identical to) the original. Where it actually improves upon the original is in its addition of a female lead.

Rita is much more interesting than Lieneke - the second girlfriend character in the original an incidental character compared with Rita. Affable, considerate, blessed with work ethic and self-deprecating modesty truck-stop waitress Rita is an unlikely heroine for a Hollywood film.

Indeed truck-stop waitress is an occupation designed for comic relief or passive anonymity in most Hollywood cinema. A female lead can usually portray one only if her character arc ends in her being beneficiary of an extreme reversal of fortune i.e. marrying a rich dude or becoming a supermodel.

Rita doesn't entertain herself with such fantasies but she does have aspirations. When Jeff walks in she remembers him from high school but he doesn't remember her. He pulls out a picture of Diane and asks if she has seen her. Rita says that her mind blots out most of the faces she sees. Yet she remembers him. This is a character that knows what she wants as unromantic as it may seem. 

This isn't what North Americans look for in movie heroines if you go by box office and surveys. They may live their lives differently and they even may be happy. But they go to movies to see something else."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":24359,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"1993-02-05","keywords":"kidnapping,obsession,missing person,buried alive,remake by original director","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Vanishing","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi805044505","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWQzZTExZTctOGY5OS00NWRiLWFjZTItMGE5ODU1ZjNjNDlhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWQzZTExZTctOGY5OS00NWRiLWFjZTItMGE5ODU1ZjNjNDlhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000313/","name":"Jeff Bridges"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000662/","name":"Kiefer Sutherland"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001802/","name":"Nancy Travis"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0806293/","name":"George Sluizer"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0469104/","name":"Tim Krabbé"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0333804/","name":"Todd Graff"}],"duration":"PT1H49M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Der Krieger und die Kaiserin
Księżniczka i wojownik
Der Krieger und die Kaiserin
programme.desc:
Der Krieger und die Kaiserin: Directed by Tom Tykwer. With Franka Potente, Benno Fürmann, Joachim Król, Lars Rudolph. Two enamoured strangers look for a warm place in a cold world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0203632/","name":"Der Krieger und die Kaiserin","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg0ZDA0NDgtNzlmMy00MTY1LTk1NGUtYjE2MWRkODc2OTZmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzA3Njg4MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two enamoured strangers look for a warm place in a cold world.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0203632/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"matzucker"},"dateCreated":"2000-10-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Tykwer's "make-or-break" is a "make", but an uneasy one.","reviewBody":"Only a fool would expect this to be a second Run Lola Run. But unfortunately, there will be a lot of fools out there: This won't be the hit that Tykwer's former film was. And, just to say that: Run Lola Run still plays in a higher league.

But that's, of course, not to say that The Princess And The Warrior is a bad movie. Quite the contrary: there should be more films like this one. It's slow at times, yes, but to the ones with keen eyes it's meditative. It's metaphysical, in the end even surreal, it's down-to-earth, but at the same time very outlandish, it's a love story, but without the usual assets: there's no kissing, let alone sex; yes, even holding hands just occurs for a second. It's about a spiritual love, something epic, as the title suggests.

Many people won't like it; far too few people will love it. And I'm somewhere in between: It's a bold movie to make, especially in the dull (to be polite) movie scene of Germany, and a good one, too. Something refreshingly different (and wonderfully written, directed, shot and acted, I might add...). But somehow, you can't help feeling just a little disappointed after the milestone of modern film making that Tom Tykwer released two years ago.

8 out of 10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":14348,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Mystery","Romance"],"datePublished":"2000-10-12","keywords":"f rated,nurse uniform,nurse outfit,caucasian,female nurse","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi626768665","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDI4OWQ0NTMtZTYxNy00YmI3LThlZmUtZThiYWNlMWJlNGJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDI4OWQ0NTMtZTYxNy00YmI3LThlZmUtZThiYWNlMWJlNGJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004376/","name":"Franka Potente"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0299811/","name":"Benno Fürmann"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0473166/","name":"Joachim Król"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0878756/","name":"Tom Tykwer"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0055954/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0075650/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0878756/","name":"Tom Tykwer"}],"duration":"PT2H15M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Spitsbergen
programme.desc: Magda (Magdalena Czerwińska), zawieszona ratowniczka medyczna, otrzymuje nagłe wezwanie. Oznacza to dla niej powrót do dramatycznych wydarzeń i ludzkich tragedii. Gdy opada poziom adrenaliny, kobieta przypomina sobie podróże na Spitsbergen - mroźną norweską wyspę na Morzu Arktycznym. To miejsce stało się dla niej powodem traumy, z którą do tej pory nie zdołała się uporać. Przerastają ją cudze nieszczęścia i własna przeszłość.

programme.title: Tamtej nocy
programme.desc: Zuzanna Szwarc (Hanna Konarowska), mama kilkuletniej dziewczynki, pracuje jako kuratorka sztuki. Pewnego wieczoru widzi napad. Dwóch mężczyzna atakuje chłopaka. Zuza nie pozostaje obojętna i stara się go obronić. Kiedy na miejsce przybywa policja, to jednak ona, nie sprawcy pobicia, zostaje aresztowana.

programme.title: 60 kilo niczego
programme.desc: Krzysztof Kowalik (Grzegorz Damięcki) zaczyna nowy dzień pracy na stanowisku kierownika kopalni kruszców. Żeby zyskać posłuch, zamierza sprawować bezwzględne rządy. Kiedy dochodzi do nieszczęśliwego wypadku, jego moralność zostaje wystawiona na próbę.

programme.title: Transfer kosmicznej energii
programme.desc: Radek jest ambitnym coachem motywacyjnym. Robi karierę w korporacji. Mężczyzna traci pewność siebie w momencie, gdy uczestniczy w bójce w knajpie. Decyduje się na nielegalne techniki hakowania mózgu. Niestety rezultaty są inne, niż się spodziewał.

programme.title: Code of the Freaks
Kodeks dziwolągów
Code of the Freaks
programme.desc: Code of the Freaks: Directed by Salome Chasnoff. With Lawrence Carter-Long, Candace Coleman, Mike Ervin, Mat Fraser. This documentary examines the representation of disabled people in Hollywood movies." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10411858/","name":"Code of the Freaks","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDEwMWU5ZjQtMjgyYS00M2RmLWEyYzYtMDM1ZmYzNWM3MTRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDU4MTQ0Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"This documentary examines the representation of disabled people in Hollywood movies.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10411858/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jramirez-66906"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Most Accurate Documentary About Disability in the Movies","reviewBody":"The documentary examines the misconceptions about the portrayal of characters with disabilities in the movies from actual advocates, writers, actors and historians who have examined more than 100 years of the cinema's view on disability. I found the range of topics going from: sex and disability, race and disability, the false message of inspirational story of a disabled person, deaf character stereotypes, blind character stereotypes, blindness as a superpower, and the so-called "happy ending" or resolution to a story of a character with a disability. The so-called "happy ending" can go in two or three ways: the disabled person has to be killed or cut off from life to restore order, the disabled person is institutionalized as a way to protect themselves from the outside world, or the disabled person is cured and does not need any form of special needs or guidance in the world. It is an insightful and in-depth documentary that makes you want to re-think about how Hollywood and movie's portrayal of disabled characters in movies can not only be misleading, but also dangerous to the disabled community in general. Hollywood must not rely on the same old stories of relying on disabled people as inspirational or cliched-stereotypes of characters who are villainous or victimized or pitied. But, one day that there will be a film with actual disabled people that are not inspirational, but living their daily lives in a humorous or ironic way that makes fun of the formula. That would be my ideal film to see when it gets made and put into a screening or a theater.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"genre":["Documentary"],"datePublished":"2020-04-01","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi853852185","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzU0MWU3OWItNzRiYi00ZDNhLWE2NGUtNGU2ZjM4MDJmMGY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzU0MWU3OWItNzRiYi00ZDNhLWE2NGUtNGU2ZjM4MDJmMGY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Original accessible trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4526433/","name":"Lawrence Carter-Long"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11657129/","name":"Candace Coleman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11657130/","name":"Mike Ervin"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3435265/","name":"Salome Chasnoff"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10730500/","name":"Susan Nussbaum"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10730499/","name":"Alyson Patsavas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10730498/","name":"Carrie Sandahl"}],"duration":"PT1H8M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 10411858, Title: Code of the Freaks, --- Description: Code of the Freaks: Directed by Salome Chasnoff. With Lawrence Carter-Long, Candace Coleman, Mike Ervin, Mat Fraser. This documentary examines the representation of disabled people in Hollywood movies." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10411858/","name":"Code of the Freaks","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDEwMWU5ZjQtMjgyYS00M2RmLWEyYzYtMDM1ZmYzNWM3MTRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDU4MTQ0Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"This documentary examines the representation of disabled people in Hollywood movies.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10411858/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"jramirez-66906","dateCreated":"2021-01-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Most Accurate Documentary About Disability in the Movies","reviewBody":"The documentary examines the misconceptions about the portrayal of characters with disabilities in the movies from actual advocates, writers, actors and historians who have examined more than 100 years of the cinema's view on disability. I found the range of topics going from: sex and disability, race and disability, the false message of inspirational story of a disabled person, deaf character stereotypes, blind character stereotypes, blindness as a superpower, and the so-called "happy ending" or resolution to a story of a character with a disability. The so-called "happy ending" can go in two or three ways: the disabled person has to be killed or cut off from life to restore order, the disabled person is institutionalized as a way to protect themselves from the outside world, or the disabled person is cured and does not need any form of special needs or guidance in the world. It is an insightful and in-depth documentary that makes you want to re-think about how Hollywood and movie's portrayal of disabled characters in movies can not only be misleading, but also dangerous to the disabled community in general. Hollywood must not rely on the same old stories of relying on disabled people as inspirational or cliched-stereotypes of characters who are villainous or victimized or pitied. But, one day that there will be a film with actual disabled people that are not inspirational, but living their daily lives in a humorous or ironic way that makes fun of the formula. That would be my ideal film to see when it gets made and put into a screening or a theater.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"genre":["Documentary"],"datePublished":"2020-04-01","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi853852185","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzU0MWU3OWItNzRiYi00ZDNhLWE2NGUtNGU2ZjM4MDJmMGY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzU0MWU3OWItNzRiYi00ZDNhLWE2NGUtNGU2ZjM4MDJmMGY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Original accessible trailer","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4526433/","name":"Lawrence Carter-Long","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11657129/","name":"Candace Coleman","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11657130/","name":"Mike Ervin"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3435265/","name":"Salome Chasnoff"],"creator":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10730500/","name":"Susan Nussbaum","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10730499/","name":"Alyson Patsavas","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10730498/","name":"Carrie Sandahl"],"duration":"PT1H8M"</script><metacontent="

Rykoszety
programme.desc: Rykoszety: Directed by Jakub Radej. With Stanislaw Linowski, Zuzanna Zielinska, Tomasz Schuchardt, Marta Scislowicz. Poland, 1982, the politically heated days of communist martial law. Two coal miner brothers react differently to the oppressive police state. While Tadek prefers to retreat into neutrality, Janek chooses active engagement in the democratic underground. When Janek asks Tadek to store some anti-government leaflets on the second anniversary of Solidarity's 1980 strikes, he triggers a spiral of events that will have everyone's allegiances and characters severely tested." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8658144/","name":"Rykoszety","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTc0ZGJlOTUtYWM5NS00MjY3LWE5YzYtNWQxMjYyNDU5NjYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEwMTY3NDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Poland, 1982, the politically heated days of communist martial law. programme.title: Le jeune Ahmed
Młody Ahmed
Le jeune Ahmed
programme.desc:
Le jeune Ahmed: Directed by Jean-Pierre Dardenne, Luc Dardenne. With Idir Ben Addi, Olivier Bonnaud, Myriem Akheddiou, Victoria Bluck. A Belgian teenager hatches a plot to kill his teacher after embracing an extremist interpretation of the Quran." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8359822/","name":"Le jeune Ahmed","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmJiNzMzYWQtZmQ1OC00ZDlkLTljNTktMmMxM2JlNzA3NmZhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjI3NDAyNg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A Belgian teenager hatches a plot to kill his teacher after embracing an extremist interpretation of the Quran.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8359822/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"omeralaa"},"dateCreated":"2020-08-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"A new Islamophobic movie","reviewBody":"At first I want to establish a few things, first that I'm a Muslim person who live in an Islamic country which is Egypt, the second is that I like The Dardennes' cinematic language and I liked (Deux jours, une nuit) so much.

There is no actual plot, the movie is just going nowhere and doesn't follow the three acts structure. The movie is a character study movie but our main character is such a flat, unrealistic and caricature character. How can a kid be like that? How can a kid have this kind of thoughts? How can a kid have this cruelty? How can a kid have this insist on doing this kind of a violent act? It was a flat character who didn't change too much from the beginning to the end. The movie represents the idea of accepting people even if they tried to hurt you, but why did the Dardenne brothers put Muslims as the bad guys? Actually why are we treated as the bad guys from everyone? Bin-Laden? come on look at Hitler or Stallin. Whatever we are the stereotype of violence now so why do I whine.

The Dardenne brothers still have their cinematic tools like the long takes, shaky camera and not using a music. And like I said I liked it in (Deux jours, une nuit) But in this movie actually these tools made the movie slow paced and boring most of the time.

At the end I didn't like the movie at all, It wasn't entertaining and its ideas were biased.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3659,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-05-22","keywords":"classroom,muslim,imam,teacher,mother son relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi452115481","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2RiNjYyN2MtNTdhOC00MmQxLWIwYmItNzE1YjkyMjkxYTk0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2RiNjYyN2MtNTdhOC00MmQxLWIwYmItNzE1YjkyMjkxYTk0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10712072/","name":"Idir Ben Addi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5672971/","name":"Olivier Bonnaud"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4159235/","name":"Myriem Akheddiou"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0201094/","name":"Jean-Pierre Dardenne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0201095/","name":"Luc Dardenne"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0075922/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0016569/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056755/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0201094/","name":"Jean-Pierre Dardenne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0201095/","name":"Luc Dardenne"}],"duration":"PT1H25M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Vivien Leigh, autant en emporte le vent: Directed by Priscilla Pizzato. With Mathieu Buscatto, Vivien Leigh, Elsa Lepoivre, Laurence Olivier. Revealed by "Gone with the Wind", Vivien Leigh entered the pantheon of the seventh art at the age of 24 as Scarlett O'Hara, the most coveted role of the time. The young actress won the Oscar for best actress in 1940. Surfing on her notoriety, Vivien Leigh went on to make five feature films before being crowned a second time in 1952 for her moving incarnation of Blanche Dubois in "A Tramway Named Desire". During the shooting, the actress was prone to crises before being diagnosed bipolar. Interned in England, she will receive electroshock therapy for many years. This documentary draws a moving portrait of the tormented woman behind the icon." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt13779498/","name":"Vivien Leigh, autant en emporte le vent","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWJlNTlkYmQtOWQxOC00MmZiLWI5NGYtOTBiMTU2MDVjNTdiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjIwNjIxNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"Revealed by "Gone with the Wind", Vivien Leigh entered the pantheon of the seventh art at the age of 24 as Scarlett O'Hara, the most coveted role of the time. programme.title: Eyewitness
Naoczny świadek
Eyewitness
programme.desc: Eyewitness: Directed by Peter Yates. With William Hurt, Sigourney Weaver, Christopher Plummer, James Woods. A janitor who claims he's seen a murder becomes romantically involved with the glamorous TV reporter covering the story." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0082353/","name":"Eyewitness","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWNmY2YyYzctNTZjYS00NjQ1LTkyMDUtYTVkYTdmZWM0YjQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTY5Nzc4MDY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A janitor who claims he's seen a murder becomes romantically involved with the glamorous TV reporter covering the story.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0082353/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dbdumonteil"},"dateCreated":"2003-09-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Two apparently independent plots.","reviewBody":"There are few films which boast such a first-rate cast:Christopher Plummer,Morgan Freeman ,Sigourney Weaver,James Woods ..And like in Hitchcock's "family plot" (1975),there are two apparently independent plots:on one hand,a shady business man's murder and a Vietnam veteran who becomes a janitor in the same building;on the other hand, a network which helps the Jews immigrate into the US.A fine thread connects the two stories:Weaver is the daughter of Jews who belong to this network and the fiancée (?) of one of them;and she's also a TV reporter who covers the affair I mention above;and she is also the janitor's idol.and...\n\nWhen,after after almost one hour,the two plots become one,they do not hang well together(in Hitchcock's "family plot" ,the connection was very smart:a simple movement of the camera followed Karen Black ).And in spite of two spectacular scenes ,the rabid dog,and the horses which give the movie a fantastic touch,the story is at once implausible and predictable .Also handicapped by pointless minor characters such as Woods' sister and Hurt's father.This film does not rank among Peter Yates 'best."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4684,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"1981-02-13","keywords":"eccentric Małgorzata Buczkowska, Karel Roden, Sergey Strelnikov, Robert Gonera, Dawid Czupryński, Mirosław Baka, Kryštof Hádek, Marek Taclík, Anna Geislerová

programme.desc:
13: Directed by Géla Babluani. With Sam Riley, Alice Barrett, Gaby Hoffmann, Jason Statham. A naive young man assumes a dead man's identity and finds himself embroiled in an underground world of power, violence, and chance where men gamble behind closed doors on the lives of other men." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0798817/","name":"13","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWE4YWZjYWItY2U0NS00N2ZlLWFkOGEtY2M2N2E0NDA5MjBlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A naive young man assumes a dead man's identity and finds himself embroiled in an underground world of power, violence, and chance where men gamble behind closed doors on the lives of other men.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0798817/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"gradyharp"},"dateCreated":"2011-11-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Gambling Can Be The Death Of You!","reviewBody":"Georgian writer Géla Babluani found such success in his film 13 Tzameti n 2005 that he decided to recreated the story, this time placing it in the United States. Co-writing this version with Gregory Pruss is the only aspect of this adaptation he shared. The story is a tough one to watch, not unlike 'Fight Club', but with higher stakes. It share how far gambling men will go to get their thrills, making cock fights seem very tame. The game at hand is based on gathering quasi-desperate men (prisoners, men deeply in debt, criminals who have little to lose, etc), placing them in a room with tee shirts bearing numbers, giving them guns, placing them in a circle, and on the command of the master of ceremonies they are to fire their gun into the head of the person in front of them. A smarmy form of Russian roulette, at first each man's gun has one bullet in the chamber, but as the game goes on more bullets are placed and the game continues until there is one man left alive. The gamblers place bets on the various numbered men and the stakes are high. This process is performed in a isolated meeting space and is closely scrutinized by detectives who seek to uncover the scheme and stop it.

Vince (Sam M. Riley of 'Control' and 'Brighton Rock') is a young electrician whose father has been in an accident resulting in sever injuries that require multiple surgeries. Vince's family must put their house up for sale to pay the expenses unless Vince can find a quicker way to make big money to pay the hospital and surgeons. Quite by accident while doing an electrical job he over hears the house owner discuss a 'job' that promises to pay a lot of money. The man plans on doing the job, receives an envelope with instructions, but then shoots up heroin and dies of an overdose. Vince helps the police who investigate, but before leaving the house Vince takes the envelope that contains instructions and a cell phone and a piece of bark with the number 13 printed on it. Vince follows the instructions and ends up in a complex scheme - the ultimate result of which is the fact that he becomes #13 in the gambling game. Others sequestered for the killer game include Mickey Rourke, Ray Winstone, and among those involved in the offensive debacle are Alexander Skarsgard, Ben Gazzara, and emcee Michael Shannon. The ending of the film is a complete surprise and revealing even part of it would ruin the impact of the film.

This is definitely not a film for the fainthearted. That such a gruesome gambling scheme could exist is terrifying. But the production and the acting and the grisly atmosphere is well worth the moviegoer's attention. 

Grady Harp"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":41256,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"keywords":"flashback,character repeats someone else's dialogue,light bulb,new york city,cigarette","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"U.S. Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1765841945","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY2NjUyNzExOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDkzNzM3Ng@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY2NjUyNzExOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDkzNzM3Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A naive young man assumes a dead man's identity and finds himself embroiled in an underground world of power, violence, and chance where men gamble behind closed doors on the lives of other men."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0727165/","name":"Sam Riley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0057055/","name":"Alice Barrett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000451/","name":"Gaby Hoffmann"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1201875/","name":"Géla Babluani"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0489955/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0489955/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0239634/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1201875/","name":"Géla Babluani"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0699294/","name":"Greg Pruss"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

Months after a zombie plague has wiped out 90 percent of the American population, a small group of survivors fight their way cross-country to a rumored refuge on the island of Catalina." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1876547/","name":"Zombie Apocalypse","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM3MTEzNjgxM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTQyNTA5Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Months after a zombie plague has wiped out 90 percent of the American population, a small group of survivors fight their way cross-country to a rumored refuge on the island of Catalina.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1876547/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"spacejoc"},"dateCreated":"2011-10-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Zombie Apocalypse? More like a writing, directing, and acting apocalypse!","reviewBody":"What can I say about this stinker? Yet another "SyFy Channel Original Movie" - otherwise known as a poorly produced steaming pile of schlock. It actually took two writers to come up with this garbage? It isn't even good for purely mocking purposes. Makeup people - when you feature a zombie in a fight, make sure you glue down their prosthetics! Computer animation effects team - you have to animate the rounds going into the gun, not just the empty shells exiting the breach . . . Ving, what happened to your career? Whew!\n\nHow is it remotely possible that SyFy can produce such great original series, but the absolute WORST movies? For good zombie fare, check out "The Walking Dead," where you actually care about the characters and the writing, direction and acting are solid. Don't waste your time - avoid this one at all costs!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5177,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Horror"],"datePublished":"2011-10-29","keywords":"explosion,zombie animal,dog,urination,severed head","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Zombie Apocalypse","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1979948569","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWJhMGMyYTEtMGViNi00MDU0LWI0YjAtZWUzZTE4YjNjYWRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWJhMGMyYTEtMGViNi00MDU0LWI0YjAtZWUzZTE4YjNjYWRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Zombie Apocalypse"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000609/","name":"Ving Rhames"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0543383/","name":"Taryn Manning"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1067251/","name":"Johnny Pacar"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0528963/","name":"Nick Lyon"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042909/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4627875/","name":"Craig Engler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2399128/","name":"Brooks Peck"}],"duration":"PT1H27M"}</script><metacontent="

Christmas Icetastrophe: Directed by Jonathan Winfrey. With Victor Webster, Jennifer Spence, Richard Harmon, Tiera Skovbye. A meteorite brings ice and freezing temperatures, which threatens to harm the residents of a small town at Christmas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3993802/","name":"Christmas Icetastrophe","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA4NTc4MzQzNDNeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDE2NzA4NjUx._V1_.jpg","description":"A meteorite brings ice and freezing temperatures, which threatens to harm the residents of a small town at Christmas.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3993802/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"story_by_corey"},"dateCreated":"2014-12-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"If you are fascinated by things being flash frozen, you will like this movie","reviewBody":"In a nutshell.....asteroid hits town starting to celebrate Christmas, Santa gets flash frozen, people scream, people flee and good looking lead actor and actress save town just before everyone is flash frozen. 

Too bad Mystery Science Theater is not still on TV, because this movie is perfect for it. There is no story line, no character development, no acting of note, no anything other than wall-to-wall things/people being flash frozen. There is not even a point to who is/isn't flash frozen. But trying to find something positive to say, it does have a lot of actors who were in other shows/movies that were much better. 

Its just a classically bad sci-fi movie and the kind of movie for people who are into such things.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1369,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.8},"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-12-20","keywords":"disaster film,meteorite,ice,small town,meteor","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005543/","name":"Victor Webster"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0817780/","name":"Jennifer Spence"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2113653/","name":"Richard Harmon"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934912/","name":"Jonathan Winfrey"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017447/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0496864/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2579139/","name":"David Sanderson"}],"duration":"PT1H26M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ba'al
Ba'al: Klątwa boga
Ba'al
programme.desc: Ba'al: Directed by Paul Ziller. With Jeremy London, Stefanie von Pfetten, Scott Hylands, David Lewis. A terminally ill archaeologist attempts to cure his cancer by retrieving the ancient amulets of the storm god Ba'al." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1122761/","name":"Ba'al","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk2NjY2MDkwNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTI4MDk0Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A terminally ill archaeologist attempts to cure his cancer by retrieving the ancient amulets of the storm god Ba'al.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1122761/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"friedman-8"},"dateCreated":"2008-09-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Very funny... though unintentionally","reviewBody":"This is a ridiculously funny TV movie, though I doubt the producers planned it that way. The dialogue is stilted, the acting is wooden and the plot is completely nonsensical. However, it's really good for a laugh. Canadians will get a kick out of watching for the ridiculous Canadian goofs. (Like much on SciFi, this picture was produced in Canada -- Vancouver, natch.) Listen for the secondary characters with their Brampton accents... the Canada Post mailbox in the background... and my favourite, the US Navy Lieutenant with bars on his collar and corporal's stripes on his sleeve (reminds me of the MASH episode where Radar gets a "field promotion" to a Captain-Corporal). To make things even better, the rank chevrons point downward, a-la Commonwealth usage. Hell... you'd think someone in the crew would have noticed this?","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":823,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2008-09-13","keywords":"disaster movie,disaster film,storm clouds gathering,airplane crash,death","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0518718/","name":"Jeremy London"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0902807/","name":"Stefanie von Pfetten"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0405111/","name":"Scott Hylands"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0956484/","name":"Paul Ziller"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017447/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0086887/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0304021/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1321917/","name":"Andrew Black"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0956484/","name":"Paul Ziller"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Freeheld
Tytuł do praw
Freeheld
programme.desc:
Freeheld: Directed by Peter Sollett. With Julianne Moore, Elliot Page, Michael Shannon, Steve Carell. New Jersey police lieutenant, Laurel Hester, and her registered domestic partner, Stacie Andree, both battle to secure Hester's pension benefits when she is diagnosed with terminal cancer." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1658801/","name":"Freeheld","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzM5NTg3NjU1MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzAwMjA3NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"New Jersey police lieutenant, Laurel Hester, and her registered domestic partner, Stacie Andree, both battle to secure Hester's pension benefits when she is diagnosed with terminal cancer.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1658801/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Reno-Rangan"},"dateCreated":"2016-08-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not another lesbian romance, but a fight for the equal rights!","reviewBody":"Not long ago I saw 'Carol', thankfully it is not another that and better than that. It was based on the documentary short of the same name about a real life same sex couple who fought for the equal rights and the pension benefits, while one of them was treated for cancer. It is a great drama about fighting for justice than the romance as it states, but that part as well very impressive.

Ellen Page and Julianne Moore, both were awesome, except Moore was a bit old. By seeing them I felt being a lesbian is sweetest than straight, hetero and even gay. The first half was all about the relationship, but very decently narrated romance tale. And in the next half once Steve Carell enters the scene, the film diverted to another side of the story. All the actors were very good, including Michael Shannon.

Obviously the story was predictable and that is expected often in a biography. Because if they want to alter it, then they should pen a very cleverest script the audience never saw one like that before. I think telling a true story as it is is the point and that's what this filmmaker did. So don't complain about the storyline, just consider whether it is inspiring or worth a watch for other reasons.

For me it was almost a sentimental piece, but the second half story compromised and then I realised what this film was trying to say. Underrated film of the year for sure. Anytime I suggest it, especially for the grown ups and with a neutral mindset, because it is not all about the same sex romance, but the battle for equality in society.

8/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12249,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2016-02-10","keywords":"lesbian kiss,gay bar,partner,cancer,public hearing","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3415913241","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYxMDM5NzA5OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTExMTUzNjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYxMDM5NzA5OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTExMTUzNjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A decorated New Jersey police detective, Laurel is diagnosed with cancer and wants to leave her hard earned pension to her domestic partner, Stacie. However the county officials, Freeholders, conspire to prevent Laurel from doing this. Hard-nosed detective Dane Wells, and activist Steven Goldstein, unite in Laurel and StacieÂ’s defense, rallying police officers and ordinary citizens to support their struggle for equality. programme.review: --- Actors: Julianne Moore (role=Laurel Hester), Elliot Page (role=Stacie Andree), Michael Shannon (role=Dane Wells), Steve Carell (role=Steven Goldstein), Luke Grimes (role=Todd Belkin), Gabriel Luna (role=Quesada), Anthony DeSando (role=Toohey), Skipp Sudduth (role=Chief Reynolds), Josh Charles (role=Bryan Kelder), Kevin O'Rourke (role=Dan Wickery), Tom McGowan (role=William Johnson), William Sadler (role=Peter Santucci)

IMDb data; ttnr: 1658801, Title: Freeheld, --- Description: Freeheld: Directed by Peter Sollett. With Julianne Moore, Elliot Page, Michael Shannon, Steve Carell. New Jersey police lieutenant, Laurel Hester, and her registered domestic partner, Stacie Andree, both battle to secure Hester's pension benefits when she is diagnosed with terminal cancer." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1658801/","name":"Freeheld","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzM5NTg3NjU1MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzAwMjA3NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"New Jersey police lieutenant, Laurel Hester, and her registered domestic partner, Stacie Andree, both battle to secure Hester's pension benefits when she is diagnosed with terminal cancer.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1658801/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Reno-Rangan","dateCreated":"2016-08-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not another lesbian romance, but a fight for the equal rights!","reviewBody":"Not long ago I saw 'Carol', thankfully it is not another that and better than that. It was based on the documentary short of the same name about a real life same sex couple who fought for the equal rights and the pension benefits, while one of them was treated for cancer. It is a great drama about fighting for justice than the romance as it states, but that part as well very impressive.

Ellen Page and Julianne Moore, both were awesome, except Moore was a bit old. By seeing them I felt being a lesbian is sweetest than straight, hetero and even gay. The first half was all about the relationship, but very decently narrated romance tale. And in the next half once Steve Carell enters the scene, the film diverted to another side of the story. All the actors were very good, including Michael Shannon.

Obviously the story was predictable and that is expected often in a biography. Because if they want to alter it, then they should pen a very cleverest script the audience never saw one like that before. I think telling a true story as it is is the point and that's what this filmmaker did. So don't complain about the storyline, just consider whether it is inspiring or worth a watch for other reasons.

For me it was almost a sentimental piece, but the second half story compromised and then I realised what this film was trying to say. Underrated film of the year for sure. Anytime I suggest it, especially for the grown ups and with a neutral mindset, because it is not all about the same sex romance, but the battle for equality in society.

8/10","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12249,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2016-02-10","keywords":"lesbian kiss,gay bar,partner,cancer,public hearing","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3415913241","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYxMDM5NzA5OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTExMTUzNjE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYxMDM5NzA5OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTExMTUzNjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A decorated New Jersey police detective, Laurel is diagnosed with cancer and wants to leave her hard earned pension to her domestic partner, Stacie. However the county officials, Freeholders, conspire to prevent Laurel from doing this. Hard-nosed detective Dane Wells, and activist Steven Goldstein, unite in Laurel and StacieÂ’s defense, rallying police officers and ordinary citizens to support their struggle for equality. ","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000194/","name":"Julianne Moore","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0680983/","name":"Elliot Page","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0136797/","name":"Steve Carell"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0813164/","name":"Peter Sollett"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0118437/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0112971/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0518293/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0638913/","name":"Ron Nyswaner"],"duration":"PT1H43M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Good Thief
Podwójny blef
The Good Thief
programme.desc:
The Good Thief: Directed by Neil Jordan. With Nutsa Kukhianidze, Ouassini Embarek, Tchéky Karyo, Marc Lavoine. An aging gambler on a losing streak attempts to rob a casino in Monte Carlo. But someone's already tipped off the cops before he even makes a move." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0281820/","name":"The Good Thief","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY2NDUyNDM5NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwODEzNTk5._V1_.jpg","description":"An aging gambler on a losing streak attempts to rob a casino in Monte Carlo. But someone's already tipped off the cops before he even makes a move.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0281820/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jotix100"},"dateCreated":"2003-05-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Bob le Flambeur this is not!","reviewBody":"I have seen every film directed by Neil Jordan. Being a big fan of his, I didn't want to miss this one. Well, it was the big disappointment of my life. This remake of Bob le Flambeur is horribly directed and acted. The last sequence is just about the best thing of this film, but as for the rest, it was just mediocre, at best.

The idea of putting together these many characters in the Riviera was probably a great thought, but then, the many actors of different nationalities and backgrounds prove to be a hindrance to the story. If one can get over the accent problem, then there is the sound track of this film, which was so hard to hear at all, at least in the theater where I saw it, that you have a double hurdle to get over.

Nick Nolte with his hair dyed a carrot hue looks hideous; he probably was going through a bad period when he made this movie. His take on Bob is fitting with the character's spiral descent into hell because of his drug problem, no doubt. But he is also hard to understand since he whispers and mumbles most of the time. A little more clarity would have helped.

 The last moments of the film are very well executed, but as caper films go, this picture doesn't contribute anything to the genre.

 Sorry Mr. Jordan, better luck next time out. Maybe leave remakes to mediocre directors. You could not improve in the original one, so why even bother?","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":10352,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2003-02-28","keywords":"heist,casino,gambler,monte carlo,voyeur","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Good Thief","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi401801497","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjY0ZTNlZTItNWE5OS00NTZhLWExMzEtNGM2YThlYjBjZjY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjY0ZTNlZTItNWE5OS00NTZhLWExMzEtNGM2YThlYjBjZjY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000560/","name":"Nick Nolte"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000146/","name":"Ralph Fiennes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0474333/","name":"Nutsa Kukhianidze"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001403/","name":"Neil Jordan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0090341/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103900/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0494138/","name":"Auguste Le Breton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578483/","name":"Jean-Pierre Melville"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001403/","name":"Neil Jordan"}],"duration":"PT1H49M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: City of Ember
Miasto cienia
City of Ember
programme.desc: City of Ember: Directed by Gil Kenan. With Saoirse Ronan, David Ryall, Harry Treadaway, Mary Kay Place. For generations, the people of the City of Ember have flourished in an amazing world of glittering lights. But Ember's once powerful generator is failing and the great lamps that illuminate the city are starting to flicker." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0970411/","name":"City of Ember","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3MDE4MDU1Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDM2NDI5MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"For generations, the people of the City of Ember have flourished in an amazing world of glittering lights. But Ember's once powerful generator is failing and the great lamps that illuminate the city are starting to flicker.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0970411/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"regnarghost"},"dateCreated":"2009-02-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Flawed... but with enough of its own to separate it from the flock","reviewBody":"Had some trouble deciding my rating on this one. There is much about it to like, for sure, but there are also some flaws that cant be overlooked. It has great setting and atmosphere, an intriguing plot and charm to boot. Such things scores a lot with me. The directing is at times questionable though, there is little sense of pacing and there are some parts that feel tacked on (the crazy flumride anybody)just because its supposed to be a summerfranchie. The cute little girl is completely superfluous, and Bill Murray and Treadaway's Doon doesn't make enough with their characters (or isn't allowed too). One thing is clear. Its strenghs of this film mostly resides within the source material(witch i haven't read though). Its really nice for a change to see a fantasy film without a lot of monsters, the enemies here are brain-stagnation, greed and selfishness. Some parts had me snickering. The parts where they are handed there jobs through lottery (a jab at communism?)and the old man with the pipes. THe story is actually pretty good, not original, but tightly woven and deceivingly fresh with a timely message. In short, the source-material had the brains, but the director lacked the guts (or maybe just the talent, or were assasinated by his studio) too go through with it.\n\nStill, it beats the latest Narnia installment, and the latest Harry Potter too for that matter. Also, Ronan, the kid from Atonement, turns in a good performance.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":64180,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Family","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2009-03-25","keywords":"apocalypse,mayor,underground city,teen angst,unknown region","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"City of Ember: Theatrical Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi543359001","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE3MTg3MzY5M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzc4NDk5MQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE3MTg3MzY5M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzc4NDk5MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"For generations, the people of the City of Ember have flourished in an amazing world of glittering lights. But Ember's once powerful generator is failing ... and the great lamps that illuminate the city are starting to flicker. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1519680/","name":"Saoirse Ronan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0429363/","name":"Toby Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000195/","name":"Bill Murray"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1481493/","name":"Gil Kenan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0036575/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0073388/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003031/","name":"Caroline Thompson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2558309/","name":"Jeanne Duprau"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="
